case.title: Looking for an alternative scene type of woman - m4w (South Norwood)
case.text:
Hi
I'm looking for an alternative woman who is into rock as well as other types of music. Also into animation, manga and all kinds of alternative in stuff.
I'm a black guy from the Croydon area and even though I don't dress alternative I like alternative stuff. I'm also a writer with a wild imagination. If you live in London that's fine but if you live in the South Norwood / Croydon area that's even better.
I hope to hear from ya!
Keep it 110%
